document_data.name: Selgard's Smithy
document_data.mainbody: '''Selgard's Smithy''' was a metalworking smithy in [[Shadowdale]], originally owned and operated by [[Bronn Selgard]].
document_data.Location: Selgard's Smithy lay in central Shadowdale along the [[North Ride]] between [[Tethgar's House]] and the [[Stone House]].
document_data.History: After Bronn's death to the [[Army of Darkhope]] in [[Nightal]], [[1374 DR]], Bronn's remaining children were hardpressed to keep up with the demands for weapons and armor by the [[Zhentarim]] who were occupying the village of Shadowdale.
